Here, we coordinate us to download all non-wikifarm wikis.

We start with a [http://www.cs.brown.edu/~pavlo/mediawiki/ list from Andrew Pavlo], which is [http://code.google.com/p/wikiteam/source/browse/trunk/listsofwikis/mediawikis_pavlo.csv mirrored here]. After discarding dead wikis, we have about ~XXXX wikis.

Download a list and use the following scripts to backup the wikis:

  # launcher.py 
  # dumpgenerator.py
